text: oh sorry about that I'm sorry my fault
it's all right forget about it sometimes
in life you might do something that
hurts another person so if you want to
be a good person in those situations you
need to apologize
here are some English expressions you
can use if you want to say that you're
sorry whoops sorry
whoops sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry
I'm very sorry I'm very sorry I'm
terribly sorry
I'm terribly sorry sorry I didn't mean
to do that sorry I didn't mean to do
that I apologize I apologize it's my
fault it's my fault my bad
my bad please forgive me please forgive
me I owe you an apology
I owe you an apology my fault bro my
fault bro sorry for keeping you waiting
sorry for keeping you waiting sorry to
bother you
sorry to bother you I'm sorry to disturb
you I'm sorry to disturb you I'm sorry
I'm late I'm sorry I'm late
we would like to apologize for the delay
we would like to apologize for the delay
I'm sorry to interrupt you I'm sorry to
interrupt you now sometimes people will
apologize to you so here are some things
you can say in response to accept their
apology that's alright that's alright I
forgive you I forgive you don't worry
about it don't worry about it forget it
forget it no problem no problem never
mind it doesn't really matter never mind
it doesn't really matter no big deal no
big deal it's all good it's all good
it's not your fault it's not your fault
please don't blame yourself oh please
don't blame yourself no worries no
worries think nothing of it
think nothing of it so those are some
ways you can apologize to someone and
also accept their apology
so thanks for watching hope you found it
useful and we'll see you next time
